common.description: Free research preview. Our goal is to make AI systems more natural and safe to interact with. Your feedback helps us improve.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.meaningOfOurBrand: “Nước” means water in Vietnamese. A fitting name to describe our love for the country while encapsulating the many climate challenges facing Vietnam.
aboutUs.ourMission: Founded in 2023, we are an interdisciplinary team who are passionate about working on climate solutions for Vietnam. Together, we have expertise in AI, space technology, healthcare, entrepreneurship, and climate solutions.
aboutUs.sponsor: This project is supported by Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

authentication.title: Welcome back
authentication.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
authentication.passwordValidator: Your password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one number, one uppercase letter and one special character
authentication.errorRefreshTokenTitle: Your login session expired. Please login again.
authentication.errorTitle: Your login session expired. Please login again.
authentication.inputOTPDescription: Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to your email. Code is valid for 10 minutes.
authentication.checkMailDescription: Please check your email {{email}} to receive instructions on how to reset your password.
authentication.setSystemCode: Please enter the system secret code

error.title: We apologize that we cannot answer this question right now. Please try again in a few minutes or report the issue to the development team. Thank you!

required.title: This field is required!
required.verifyOTP: Please enter your verify OTP code!
